attributes.action: actively work to end child slavery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The International Labour Organization estimates there are  218 million working children aged between five and 17.  There are about 300,000 child soldiers involved in over 30 areas of conflict worldwide, some even younger than 10 years old.  This must stop!

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ChildSlavery/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
